titles.title: Expressing support for celebrating the fourth week in April as Every Kid Healthy Week.
Expressing support for celebrating the fourth week in April as Every Kid Healthy Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Encourages schools, communities, and organizations to conduct Every Kid Healthy Week activities.
Recognizes the importance of promoting healthy lifestyles and healthy learning environments for all children.
